page.title: 01LANDSCAPE AND FEATURES
page.content: The area includes the eastern edge of{Knaresborough}and contains some of the expansion of the town, while the western edge approaches the A1. The railway from{Harrogate}to{York passes through the area To the south of the block lies the village of {Goldsborough.}The village of{Flaxby and most of the village of{Coneythorpe is included. The landscape is undulating as it descends to the{Plain of York.}The land is mainly arable grade 2/3 with some woodland,much of this previously belonging to{Goldsborough Hall}estate. There is gravel-bearing land and an abandoned quarry to the north west. There are caravan sites and some light industry.
